title: Bug splat
body: Just started ranked game and after champion select i get bug splatted and now i had data corruption. Anyone else just had this happen to them?

replies.body: It sounds like corrupt game files are causing the game to render improperly, and crashing the game.  Our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide can help get you fixed up and those files repaired.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) for extra, automatic utility.  Hope that helps!
Aren't you tired of replying to the same problem for everyone? Don't you have eyes that many people are having the exact same issue? doesn't that make sense your game has a bug?
